, Refused to apply inline style because it violates the following Content Security Policy directive: "style-src 'self' https://fonts.googleapis.com". Either the 'unsafe-inline' keyword, a hash ('sha256-eihbhM8jjxKocP9n7E1qpDf42orJweXDKBG/mKHTSNY='), or a nonce ('nonce-...') is required to enable inline execution. Note that hashes do not apply to event handlers, style attributes and javascript: navigations unless the 'unsafe-hashes' keyword is present.
